'''1.14.3 Pre-Release 1''' (known as '''1.14.3-pre1''' in the launcher) is the first pre-release for [[Java Edition 1.14.3]], released on June 3, 2019,<ref>{{Mcnet|minecraft-1-14-3-pre-release-1|Minecraft 1.14.3 Pre-Release 1|June 3, 2019}}</ref> which makes small changes to [[villager]]s and fixes some bugs left over from [[Java Edition 1.14.2|1.14.2]].

== Changes ==
=== Mobs ===
'''[[Villager]]s'''
* Panicking villagers now have a higher chance of spawning [[iron golem]]s.
* Farmers now spend more time farming when they are working.
* Farmers now always give away food even if other villagers do not need it.

=== General ===
'''Performance'''
* Improved performance.
